name: Double Trouble (Yousaf Wajih)
description:
In this game, you’ll be a robot whose life is … doubled. You are seeing two worlds, both containing a copy of you. When you move, the other robot moves. Both worlds have other vicious creatures. But they’re are located at different locations in different worlds. Can you reach the end of all levels the vicious creatures hit any robot?

This game is made for:
DevSquad Academy Jam
